meta.title: Home - Keefe Regional Technical School

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

div.h3:
Keefe Tech students will be finishing the 2019-2020 school year remotely. See our COVID-19 page for most recent information.
Thinking about Keefe Tech for high school - Start your application today!

h3.br: Students who have received an acceptance letter from Keefe Tech as a member of the Class of 2024 are asked ton confirm their placement by May 1st!

div.h4: Achieve academic excellence! Take advantage of a wide variety of College Prep, Honors, and AP courses.
Be college and career ready! Work individually and in teams to develop the expertise, confidence and skills for today's top careers.

Learn from experts! Connect with experienced and qualified instructors to acquire technical and academic skills for high-demand careers.
Put your education to work! Apply yourself to real world, hands-on experiences that launch you into an exciting career and lifestyle.
Look forward to school! Make the most of your high school experience by discovering what you’re passionate about.
Expand your options! Merge your robust academic education and career tech experience to gain a powerful competitive advantage.
Students are encouraged to get involved in the school community! Join a sports team, participate in club, work with teachers after school. The opportunities are endless!

div.h3: The remainder of the 2019-2020 will continue with remote learning. Please see our COVID-19 page for the most up to date information.
We are currently finishing the school year remotely. Many community resources are linked in our COVID-19 page.

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

span.a: Please click here for updated district information regarding extended school closure and COVID-19. Includes all school and community resources. School is operating off campus for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

img.alt: Keefe Tech represents at SkillsUSA Leadership & Skills Conference!

div.a: Keefe Tech represents at SkillsUSA Leadership & Skills Conference!

div.p: Keefe Regional Technical School students won a total of 39 medals during the District 3 SkillsUSA Leadership & Skills Conference, also hosted by Keefe Tech on Wednesday, February 26, 2020. Students from 14 schools within the district participated in skills and leadership competitions in their career and technical areas at the conference.

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about Keefe Tech represents at SkillsUSA Leadership & Skills Conference!

img.alt: New Student Leadership Program at Keefe Tech

div.a: New Student Leadership Program at Keefe Tech

div.p: Day one of our new student leadership program was a success! Students from grade 9, 10, 11 and 12 were recommended to participate and did an amazing job connecting with each other and getting out of their comfort zones.

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about New Student Leadership Program at Keefe Tech

div.p: Check out our first alumni highlight article about two successful brothers who are graduates of Keefe Tech's Plumbing Program. If you have an alumni success story to share, please reach out to us at alumni@jpkeefehs.org.

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about Keefe Tech Alumni Highlights!

div.h4: Thinking of making Keefe Tech a part of your future?

div.p: Bronco Bulletin is published every other week sharing student success stories, highlights and information for everyone in the Keefe Tech community.

p.a: Click here for most recent Bronco Bulletin

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window
